basics.name: Babacar Ndao
basics.label: Bioinformatics Engineer
basics.summary: Bioinformatics engineer with experience in high-throughput sequencing data analysis, including bulk and single-cell RNA-seq. Skilled in developing reproducible analysis pipelines and translating complex biological questions into computational solutions using R, Python and Bash.

work.name: Inserm UMR RIGHT (U1098)
work.summary: Processing and interpretation of high-throughput sequencing datasets. Development of tailored bioinformatics analyses to support multidisciplinary research projects.

work.name: Centre de Recherche en Cancérologie de Marseille
work.summary: Single-cell RNA-seq analysis of murine promyelocytes transformed with the oncogenic fusion protein PLZF-RARA.

work.name: Muséum national d'Histoire naturelle
work.summary: Genomic approach to identify sex chromosomes in the great white shark.
